int main (int argc, char **argv)
 Load a song, play it multiple times (tearing down the song player between iterations), check that all memory is returned.

Detailed Description

Play a song and check for memory leaks.

Author:
Phil Burk, Robert Marsanyi Copyright 2005 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL
Play the song more than once to make sure the leaks are not just one-time allocations by SPMIDI.
